previewArticle.title: Chile vs. USA | International Friendly Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chile 3, USA 2 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Swerve
timelineItems.text: Well, that was a short lived lead. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Däve Agee
timelineItems.text: Awful marking. #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Offside, Chile. Mark González tries a through ball, but Roberto Gutiérrez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡GOL! (10') | González centra y Gutiérrez lo empata con la cabeza. #CHIvUSA 1-1

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two goals in less than 10 minutes: http://t.co/fEWog9iqYx #CHIvUSA

timelineItems.name: Andrew Matz
timelineItems.text: Matt Besler giveth, then Matt Besler giveth away. #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Bryan Carrasco.

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Very open game early on. Both sides look vulnerable in wide areas. #USAvCHI #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Comenta el partido con nosotros en nuestro Matchcenter: http://t.co/iZKT1Ar5fd #CHIvUSA 1-1 (12')

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Goals for both team early on. The home crowd was silent but after Shea's goal; they're working their way back into it. Chile shoots wide now

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. DeAndre Yedlin (USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Goal foreseeable from seconds earlier. Dropped mark allowed Gutierrez to ghost free. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Zach Ward
timelineItems.text: There are more unmarked Chileans in the midfield than marked ones. #CHIvUSA

timelineItems.name: Thomas Avery
timelineItems.text: Oh Yedlin... That was a goal bud. #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: HIT THAT FIRST TIME, YEDLIN. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: John Charles
timelineItems.text: When it comes to center backs you want consistency/solid/smart players. That is not Jermaine Jones game. Hes a bulldog and workhorse #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Juan Cornejo.
Attempt saved. Steve Birnbaum (USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Michael Bradley with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: That's better from Jones. Always been good clogging channels, but aerial stuff defensively has been his Achilles' heel. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Mark González (Chile) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (USA).
Foul by Jozy Altidore (USA).
Roberto Gutiérrez (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Brandon
timelineItems.text: DeAndre Yedlin is covering an insane amount of ground. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Bobby Wood (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juan Cornejo (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Note Bradley's movement when Jones pushes forward out of the back. Quickly puts himself in a good position to cover. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Roberto Gutiérrez (Chile) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Bryan Carrasco.

timelineItems.name: laura mcfayden
timelineItems.text: Yedlin and Jones look like BFFS out there. #CHIvUSA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Pulgar (Chile) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Diego Valdés.
Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Matt Besler.
Match ends, Chile 3, USA 2.

timelineItems.name: Chase Glorfield
timelineItems.text: Not a bad result, per say (on the road early in the American season), but the second-half wilting leaves a bad taste in the mouth. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Josiah Street
timelineItems.text: Dr. Klinsi needs a new hypothesis, because this one has been less than a success. #USMNT #CHIvUSA

timelineItems.name: Billy Gordon
timelineItems.text: Well I started watching and ruined everything. I'm sorry America. #USMNT 🇺🇸

timelineItems.name: Shuaib B Ahmed
timelineItems.text: Not a bad effort from #USMNT. Just need to figure out a way to close the game. To maintain that structure for entire 90 is difficult.

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Cohen
timelineItems.text: What's the time frame on the excuse that Jurgen is just "experimenting, seeing what works?" The Gold Cup? After that? #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Thomas Solar
timelineItems.text: Forwards look good. Mids are doing their job. Def needs work. But 18 min in and I like the 3-5-2 we can get another goal #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Osvaldo González (Chile) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: A.J. Hoffmann
timelineItems.text: Dempsey always looks like he drank a fifth of bourbon the night before. #USMNT #USAvsChile

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Medel (Chile) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Roberto Gutiérrez.
DeAndre Yedlin (USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Juan Cornejo (Chile).

timelineItems.name: David Rudin
timelineItems.text: I was really hoping for #BrekTheInternet to catch on. Alas, #USMNT (and America, really) cannot be relied upon.

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Bradley & Mix need to have more of an impact. Space on defense & too reliant on wings in attack. #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: The #USMNT wingbacks are taking advantage of space in front of them, but the CMs are struggling to find a rhythm, leave their imprint.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Brek Shea (USA) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Clint Dempsey with a headed pass following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Charles Cole
timelineItems.text: Dear wingers in this 3-5-2 system, you are responsible to get back on defense. Looking at you, Shea. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Jermaine Jones.

timelineItems.name: William Pike II
timelineItems.text: I'm not sure Jozy Altidore has really had a touch so far in this game. #CHIvsUSA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Daniel Jones
timelineItems.text: Altidore cannot buy a call #USMNT

timelineItems.name: John Moore
timelineItems.text: Mix Diskerud shouldn't be #10 for #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, USA. Clint Dempsey tries a through ball, but Bobby Wood is caught offside.
Brek Shea (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: #USMNT players look like they're avoiding hoofing ball upfield. Klinsmann has said repeatedly since WC he wants defense to avoid long balls.

timelineItems.name: Ben
timelineItems.text: JOZY! #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jason Crigger
timelineItems.text: What a pass by Mix. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Mark Fishkin
timelineItems.text: Nicely done, Jozy! #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mix Diskerud (USA).
Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: Speak of the devil. Great buildup and nicely finished by Jozy. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marco Medel (Chile) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mark González.
Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Jermaine Jones.

timelineItems.name: Brian Sciaretta
timelineItems.text: In my career of covering the #usmnt, January camp games have generally been horrible. This one has been open and fun

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chile. Marco Medel tries a through ball, but Mark González is caught offside.
Foul by Erick Pulgar (Chile).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Jermaine Jones (USA) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡JOOOOOOOZYYYYYY! ✌️⚽️🇺🇸 #CHIvUSA 1-2

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: The two most widely criticised players so far have found the back of the net. Bobby Wood's up next! #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Diego Valdés (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).
Juan Cornejo (Chile) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).

timelineItems.name: Rolando Otero
timelineItems.text: US sweet passing w/finish by Jozy @AOFTL50 at @MickeyByrnesPub watching #USMNT take on chile #USAvCHI @Flight_19 http://t.co/oSnEVWNnSC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mark González (Chile).
Nick Rimando (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: USMNTtoday
timelineItems.text: Are we sure Bradley is the one to take all set pieces? Arguably our best player, but not sure he's the best for free kicks #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Diego Valdés (Chile) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: High five #CHIvUSA http://t.co/BNQleLXzTe

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Nick Rimando saving Jermaine Jones' lunch #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mix Diskerud (USA).

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: This game is becoming an adventure for Jermaine Jones. And by "adventure," I mean "disaster." #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Eric Garment
timelineItems.text: nice save from rimando! #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Brek Shea.
Attempt missed. Erick Pulgar (Chile) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Mark González with a headed pass following a corner.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Here's what I would like to see at halftime: Pull off Wood, move Dempsey and Mix up a slot each, bring on Trapp. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Kevin Otte
timelineItems.text: Nick Rimando absolutely deserves to be in net for #USMNT. He's a beast in MLS and has played well today vs Chile.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Besler (USA).
Marco Medel (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Jon Marthaler
timelineItems.text: Mix Diskerud plays the game with the joy of a teenager being forced to do chores on a Saturday morning. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Petke MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Yedlin's got that speed. Hot nasty badass speed #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Tony Larsen
timelineItems.text: Bobby Wood being outplayed on both sides of the field. Hope that changes quickly. #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Michael Donnelly
timelineItems.text: Rimando doesn't inspire the utmost confidence when balls are played through the air into the box. #USAvCHI #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by José Rojas (Chile).
Jozy Altidore (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Clint Dempsey (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Will Deem
timelineItems.text: If Jermaine Jones can adjust to being a true central defender and the last stop on D, he is a beast of a man to have to deal with. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mix Diskerud (USA).
Marco Medel (Chile) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Birnbaum dominating his man, like a boss #usmnt #birdbomb

timelineItems.name: Jon Townsend
timelineItems.text: Brek Shea, please challenge for the ball. That service required only a touch to score. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Nick Abbott
timelineItems.text: Spanish language announcers predicting Jozy will be MLS MVP this year #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Josh Lowe
timelineItems.text: #USMNT defense is still an abomination. Lucky to be up 2:1.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Marcinko
timelineItems.text: That's onside. Poor call. Lucky break, #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chile. Marco Medel tries a through ball, but Roberto Gutiérrez is caught offside.
Hand ball by Clint Dempsey (USA).

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Besler and Jones haven't inspired a ton of confidence on the defensive side. Clearly still learning these new roles. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Roberto Gutiérrez (Chile).
First Half ends, Chile 1, USA 2.

timelineItems.name: Steve Davis
timelineItems.text: 1st hlf #USMNT props: Diskerud's tackling & assist. Yedlin's 2-way work. Shea's only meaningful kick in a yr. Altidore's effort & finish

timelineItems.name: Hev Rose
timelineItems.text: Birnbaum has looked awesome in his #usmnt debu, best defender so far. But I might be biased. #dcu

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Bobby Wood has been anonymous and Dempsey not doing enough defensively, bring on Nguyen for Wood and move Dempsey up top. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Chile 1, USA 2.
Foul by Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile).
Brek Shea (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: 45 minutes to go. #USMNT up 2-1 over Chile: http://t.co/Y52gb3g9Iv #CHIvUSA

timelineItems.comment: Marco Medel (Chile) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (USA).
Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Brek Shea.

timelineItems.name: Steve Fallon
timelineItems.text: Brek Shea is so disruptive when on form. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chile. Juan Cornejo tries a through ball, but Roberto Gutiérrez is caught offside.
Diego Valdés (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (USA).
Attempt blocked. Mark González (Chile) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Bryan Carrasco with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Hev Rose
timelineItems.text: Rimando’s distribution is so good. #usmnt fortunate to have such a stellar 3rd (now 2nd) goalkeeper:

timelineItems.name: FieldDay4theSundays
timelineItems.text: I knew this game Wood get even better at halftime Nguyen Klinsmann made some changes. #USMNT @ussoccer

timelineItems.name: Jimmy Nelson
timelineItems.text: Wow, Nguyen gets a yellow for THAT?! The check from Chile must've cleared. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chile. Juan Cornejo tries a through ball, but Roberto Gutiérrez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Backheel
timelineItems.text: We credit @AlexiLalas with the decision to place a mic right next to Klinsmann tonight #Hero #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Josh Fellman
timelineItems.text: Yedlin is going to be an absolute stud in the next few years. #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jermaine Jones (USA).
Diego Valdés (Chile) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Paul Y.
timelineItems.text: Wowwww! What a save from Nicky Rimando. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Brek Shea (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Bryan Carrasco (Chile).
Mark González (Chile) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (USA).
Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Brek Shea.
Attempt missed. Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.

timelineItems.name: USMNTtoday
timelineItems.text: Shea...... #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Rayao'
timelineItems.text: Brek Shea showing why he AIN'T a defender.... #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Not enjoying the "Brek Shea, left back" all that much so far. Simple chest back to goalkeeper: out of bounds for corner kick. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: DeAndre Yedlin (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mark González (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Johnathan
timelineItems.text: There's the long ball over the top that's been missing from my life. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Christian Bruey
timelineItems.text: Brek Shea looked like he was shot out of a cannon on that last run! #USMNT @OrlandoCitySC

timelineItems.name: Backheel
timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen would have completed that pass if he still had the hair #WellNeverLetItGo #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chile. Gonzalo Espinoza tries a through ball, but Roberto Gutiérrez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rich Kulesa
timelineItems.text: Klinsmann literally has to tell Shea what to do with the ball. Embarrassing. #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Mike Anzalone
timelineItems.text: I hear Klinsy screaming on the sidelines and really want to hear him say, "get to the chopper!" #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jozy Altidore (USA).
Bryan Carrasco (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Backheel
timelineItems.text: Klinsmann is a big fan of Jozy's chest and its exploits #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marco Medel (Chile).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Habermehl
timelineItems.text: Brek Shea! #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Kevin Noonan
timelineItems.text: Loving the #USMNT red socks.

timelineItems.name: Rich Elles
timelineItems.text: #USMNT LETS GOOOOO SHEA! #beatChile

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Brek Shea is gassed. Needs a sub badly. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Birnbaum has won his battles, but his most impressive play yet was having the awareness to step up on that counter. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Jozy Altidore (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Osvaldo González (Chile).

timelineItems.name: JoeSpeaker
timelineItems.text: If Jermaine Jones's name was Tim Ream, he'd never get called in again. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Kevin Noonan
timelineItems.text: There it is: Wil Trapp's first #USMNT cap. Congrats, Wil! #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Brandon Edwards
timelineItems.text: IT’S A TRAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP! #USMNT #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Setting the Table
timelineItems.text: Klinsmann at dinner: "THE STEAK SAUCE!! PASS IT! PASS IT NOW!!!!" #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Josiah Street
timelineItems.text: Brek looks languid. Deuce looks lethargic. Jones looks labored. #USMNT #CHIvUSA #preseason

timelineItems.comment: Michael Bradley (USA) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Jozy Altidore.

timelineItems.name: Peter Haley, GFOP
timelineItems.text: MAH GAWD MB90 SO CLOSE #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Justin Gibbons
timelineItems.text: Hit the crossbar AND the post 😭😂 #USMNT

timelineItems.name: David Ulloa
timelineItems.text: I feel Klinsmann is messing with me he starts Brek and Wood and then finally plays Trapp and Lee? What's next Zardes? #USMNT thank you Jesus

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jermaine Jones (USA).
Roberto Gutiérrez (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: benflation
timelineItems.text: OOF Birnbaum #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Anan
timelineItems.text: Birnbaum and jones owe rimando some beers #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Juan Delgado (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Wil Trapp (USA).
Corner,  Chile. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.
Attempt missed. Osvaldo González (Chile) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Marco Medel with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: NYCFCBlues
timelineItems.text: Mix subbed out after 58 minutes... Strong shift for him, strong in the tackle, nice assist #NYCFC #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Bryan Carrasco (Chile) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Birnbaum and Besler have just both had shaky moments #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Wil Trapp (USA).
Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Bad Jozy pass leads to the counter, Birnbaum briefly frozen; not awful but could have done better #usmnt #dcu #mls

timelineItems.name: Brian Lomax
timelineItems.text: How did Rimando concede that? #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Petke MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Well that was a long time coming #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Derek Lilleskov
timelineItems.text: So instead of Besler and 3 guys who can't play defense, how about we put in a real CB... I'm just saying #Hedges #USMNT

timelineItems.name: SND Herb
timelineItems.text: Great stop by Michael Bradley turns into a sloppy giveaway from Jozy. That defines the USA. #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gonzalo Espinoza (Chile).
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Adam
timelineItems.text: Klinsmann just spoiling us with young star debuts tonight. Gyasi zardes on. #USAvCHI #USMNT

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dempsey fouled and Bradley takes a short freekick. It's played over the top for Brek Shea and he volleys it home! 1-0 for the #USMNT!

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Hey 2011 Brek Shea - long time no see. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Osvaldo González (Chile).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Juan Delgado (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Matt Besler (USA).

timelineItems.name: Joe Darnall
timelineItems.text: No real possession for the Yanks. Must do better and not rely on long balls. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Tyler Hilton
timelineItems.text: This game is quickly going to Chile, need a spark #USMNT

timelineItems.name: PZ
timelineItems.text: Has Trapp completed a pass to a teammate yet? Seems to keep finding red shirts, though. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Carver Shaw
timelineItems.text: Possession is a good thing. Completed passes are good too. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bryan Carrasco (Chile).
Brek Shea (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Gonzalo Fierro (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jozy Altidore (USA).

timelineItems.name: Harry M. Stache
timelineItems.text: I'm just not impressed with anything Klinsmann has done with the #USMNT.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Medel (Chile) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Gonzalo Fierro.

timelineItems.name: tommy caruso
timelineItems.text: I love Jermaine Jones but he's been a turnover machine in this game. He got to be better if we are to keep playing a 3-5-2 #USAvCHI #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Brett Cantrell
timelineItems.text: We are not a second half team. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Zach Dooley
timelineItems.text: Wondo steps onto the pitch.....Chile pulls in front. Coincidence? I think not. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Brett Basler
timelineItems.text: Save us Wondo! #USMNT @typikal_tony

timelineItems.name: US Soccer News
timelineItems.text: Chile takes the lead. Defensive nightmare for the #USMNT.

timelineItems.name: bill gordon
timelineItems.text: Chile dominating the 2nd half and take the lead 3-2. #USMNT playing at zombie pace. #USAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Michael Bradley.

timelineItems.name: Nick Degel
timelineItems.text: If Yedlin doesn't want to defend just make him a damn winger. Two goals in a row he has be caught watching the game. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Ryan Lanigan
timelineItems.text: Great strike from Nguyen, who started the build up, but it's just wide. #USMNT #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Phil Shore
timelineItems.text: Yes, #USMNT moved to a 4-4-2 in second half. Marking has been even worse in second half though Also looks like a lot of tired legs out there

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Seriously, what position is Jones actually playing right now? Because he's literally living in Chile's box. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mix Diskerud (USA).
Diego Valdés (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Chris Wondolowski (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juan Delgado (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Nguyen almost nearly smacked Zardes in the face with that shot, btw. Good looking out, Gyasi. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Chris Wondolowski (USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Michael Bradley with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Braden B. Mummert
timelineItems.text: Looking terrific offensively, but you cant get a W with lousy defending. Step it up #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Header from Wondo off a Bradley cross. Almost snuck into the net. #USAvCHI #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Phil West
timelineItems.text: I believe that we will Nguyen (or at least tie) #USMNT #USAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Paul Kennedy
timelineItems.text: #USMNT has now allowed 9 goals in last 3 games. Most in 3 games since 1993.

timelineItems.comment: Wil Trapp (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Erick Pulgar (Chile).

timelineItems.name: A.J. Landon
timelineItems.text: Nguyen and Zardes looks good for #USMNT. Have to sure up that back line still. Jones is going to have to play there.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Michael Bradley (USA) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Down a goal late. Cue the Donovan banter. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: Jim O'Leary
timelineItems.text: Bradley showing great skills on the ball, but terrible attacks. But let's keep him up front. #JustJurgenThings #CHIvUSA #USMNT cc:@torontofc

timelineItems.comment: José Rojas (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gyasi Zardes (USA).

timelineItems.name: Son of Hank
timelineItems.text: Don't understand the love affair with Bradley. He's been marginal tonight at best. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Brek Shea (USA).
Gonzalo Fierro (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Mike Diodati
timelineItems.text: This team is really going to have to learn how to play 90 minutes, not 65 or 70...and defend. #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Roberto Gutiérrez (Chile) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gonzalo Espinoza.
Corner,  Chile. Conceded by Jermaine Jones.

timelineItems.name: Taylor Twellman
timelineItems.text: Ball from @MattBesler was perfect because it allowed @BrekShea to hit it 1st time. Shea timed his run perfectly. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Justin
timelineItems.text: I think if #USMNT puts together a full 90 of the 1st half of this game we go away with the W. Good game though. ⚽

timelineItems.name: Daniel Nyari
timelineItems.text: When #USMNT playing B Chile Team they're playing against decades of cultivated tactics/style, meanwhile U.S. at starting point of identity.

timelineItems.name: benflation
timelineItems.text: Lee had a good game, in the five or seven touches he was able to get. Good through ball just then. #usmnt #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.
Juan Delgado (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Wil Trapp (USA).
Second Half ends, Chile 3, USA 2.

timelineItems.name: Johnny Mosho
timelineItems.text: It's frustrating to see a team with so much young potential not being able to finish out games. What is Klinsmann doing out there... #USMNT
